common_issues.title: Pieces Desktop App Display Issues
common_issues.description: Users report difficulties viewing large markdown responses in the Pieces Copilot on the Windows desktop application.  Scrolling is impaired due to oversized content.  Additionally, some users experience issues with code block collapsing and sidebar functionality. Troubleshooting steps include checking Pieces OS version and ensuring it's up-to-date.

related_issues.title: Showing very big markdown in copilot
related_issues.text: Showing very big markdown in copilot ### Software Desktop Application ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version 12.2.1 When I am sending questions to the Pieces copilot and it should respond with a block of code or a command to use the first one is very big and making it hard to scroll down to see the rest of the response. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces connectivity and login issues across platforms
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing difficulty connecting Pieces extensions and plugins (VS Code, Chrome, Edge) to the Pieces OS.  Issues include continuous installation requests for the VS Code extension, inability to log in, and failure to connect even with VPN configurations.  Additionally, some users report Pro features not activating despite upgrading.  Troubleshooting steps include reinstalling dependencies, checking VPN settings, and ensuring the Pieces OS is running.

related_issues.title: VScode extension continuously requesting installation, never installs unable to load extension
related_issues.text: VScode extension continuously requesting installation, never installs unable to load extension ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Desktop Application, VS Code ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version 12.2.1 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. VScode extension continuously requesting installation, never installs unable to load extension. I have installed the extension from VSC, installed all the dependencies multiple times and never able to sign in, never able to launch Pieces from within VSC. I have the desktop running and installed and initialised every time, it makes no difference. I have even added the extension to web browsers and both work flawlessly. See screen shot below. Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Pieces extension for Chrome & edge cannot connect to pieces OS
related_issues.text: Pieces extension for Chrome & edge cannot connect to pieces OS ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Web Extension, Pieces OS ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version 12.1.1 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. Even if the VPN for the browser plugin is turned off, and the virtual network card and global proxy for the desktop VPN are turned on, it is still not possible to connect the browser, including the edge and Chrome pieces plugins, to the pieces OS. PS: My pieces OS and pieces for developers are both installed in sequence on Microsoft Store. - They work well in other aspects. - I have been using them for about 7 days. - I am in Chinese Mainland, thus a heavy VPN user. - Pieces OS has been upgraded to Pro. Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces OS connection issues across multiple platforms
common_issues.description: Users are reporting difficulties connecting Pieces extensions and plugins (Obsidian, Chrome, Edge) to Pieces OS.  Problems include undetected ports, failed logins, and pro features not activating. This affects Windows users, some using VPNs.  Check Pieces OS version, port settings (default changed to 39300), and ensure the Pieces desktop app is running and connected.

related_issues.title: Pieces extension for Obsidian using port 1000 but Pieces OS now listening port 39300
related_issues.text:
Pieces extension for Obsidian using port 1000 but Pieces OS now listening port 39300
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Obsidian

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

PiecesOS Version: 12.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I installed Obsidian and added the Pieces extension. The chat works ok, but within Obsidian when I highlight text and right click to send to Pieces it fails. Checking inside Obsidian the Pieces setup it says Pieces port not detected, and does not allow me to set port for Pieces OS within Obsidian.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Pieces extension for Chrome & edge cannot connect to pieces OS
related_issues.text: Pieces extension for Chrome & edge cannot connect to pieces OS ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Web Extension, Pieces OS ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version 12.1.1 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. Even if the VPN for the browser plugin is turned off, and the virtual network card and global proxy for the desktop VPN are turned on, it is still not possible to connect the browser, including the edge and Chrome pieces plugins, to the pieces OS. PS: My pieces OS and pieces for developers are both installed in sequence on Microsoft Store. - They work well in other aspects. - I have been using them for about 7 days. - I am in Chinese Mainland, thus a heavy VPN user. - Pieces OS has been upgraded to Pro. Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces Desktop Application Bugs
common_issues.description: Users report issues with the Pieces desktop application, including unintended selection behavior (potentially related to stuck shift/mouse click), inability to collapse code blocks, and sidebar issues such as error logs not saving and pro settings not applying despite being logged in.  These issues span different Pieces OS versions (12.2.1, 12.2.2) and Desktop versions (4.3.1, 4.3.4).

related_issues.title: it doesnt stop selecting, it seems like "shift" or "mouse 1" is locked
related_issues.text:
it doesnt stop selecting, it seems like "shift" or "mouse 1" is locked
### Checked for Existing Issues?

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

4.3.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I'm not sure how to make it happen but its **extremely** annoying, it seems like it thinks I'm holding "shift" or "mouse 1", i use the arrow keys a lot but when this bug is active it selects instead of moving, when i try to click when its active it also selects, i cant ctrl + v when its active :(

common_issues.title: Pieces OS and Desktop App Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing problems with backup restoration, core dependencies, and the Pieces sidebar. Backup restoration fails to complete, core dependencies encounter retry step errors, and the sidebar has display issues and pro setting access problems.  Check logs, reinstall, and ensure Pieces OS and app versions are compatible.

related_issues.title: backup restoration fails
related_issues.text: backup restoration fails ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Desktop Application ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version Pieces 4.3.4 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. choosing a bakup to restore begins as normal but the loading progress stops, resets and is stuck on the restore screen [log-08202025.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/21900374/log-08202025.txt) [log-08202025.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/21900381/log-08202025.txt) Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Ensure core dependencies; Retry Step
related_issues.text:
Ensure core dependencies; Retry Step
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

### Pieces OS, Desktop Application

* Operating System / Platform: Linux

* Pieces OS Version 4.3.1





After installation, the “Initialize Desktop App” step has run successfully. The “Ensure core dependencies” step displays the message “Retry Step”.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. recommendations: Prioritize resolving connectivity issues between Pieces OS and extensions/plugins (VS Code, Obsidian, Chrome, Edge). Focus on port detection, login failures, and Pro feature activation.
Investigate and address the Pieces Desktop application issues: unintended selection behavior, code block collapsing, and sidebar problems (error logs, Pro settings).
Improve the Pieces Copilot experience by fixing markdown display issues (scrolling, oversized content) and code block collapsing functionality.
Address Pieces OS core dependency errors during installation and backup restoration failures.
Look into reports of high RAM/CPU usage by Pieces OS and authentication loop/500 errors during sign-in.
